episodes.title: Sato nuke
episodes.plot: Sasuke leaves the leaf village in search of power.

episodes.title: Otte
episodes.plot: The Anbu who attack Naruto and Shikamaru are agents sent by Danzo, who had promised Orochimaru that he would deliver Sasuke safely to him. Luckily, Neji, Lee and Tenten rush to their aid in the nick of time. Meanwhile, Hiruko reveals the truth behind the incident involving Hizashi.

episodes.title: Shôtotsu
episodes.plot: Naruto reaches the tower Sasuke was heading for, thanks to Neji, Lee and Tenten deterring the agents from the Foundation. But it's too late-Sasuke's already made contact with Orochimaru. Naruto passionately tries to reason with Sasuke, but ultimately their powers collide.

episodes.title: Môhitotsu no tsuki
episodes.plot: Naruto wakes up and is told by Shikamaru that Sasuke is no where to be found, and that the Anbu they were fighting retreated. While Tsunade updates Minato on the shinobi Sasuke attacked when he left the village, Shizune arrives with news someone infiltrated the village. Pain arrives and talks to Tsunade, vowing to cause the village pain. Pain attacks the village with a gigantic Chibaku Tensei. Naruto and the others arrive in the morning to find a crater where Konohagakure was supposed to be, with the Chibaku Tensei floating above it. Neji confirms the chakra of the ...

episodes.title: Nakama
episodes.plot: Seeing Hinata almost die triggers Naruto's anger and he goes into Nine Tails State. Naruto's power is enormous, but Pain releases his jutsu to seal him away. Hatred consumes Naruto as he tries to break the seal. With Naruto unable to calmly control the Nine Tails' power, the village steadily heads toward destruction.

episodes.title: Shinobi-tachi no kyôen
episodes.plot: Several months after Pain's attack, Jiraiya arrives with intel regarding the Akatsuki, who are attacking shinobi villages and kidnapping their Kage and jonin. He also reveals that Sasuke is working with them. Naruto is determined to bring his friend and comrade Sasuke back, once and for all.

episodes.title: Raibaru
episodes.plot: Naruto wants to bring Sasuke back to the village, but Sasuke burns with a desire to bring Naruto down. Why is Sasuke so confrontational, and how did his feelings toward Naruto develop? The truth rises to the surface during Sasuke's relentless attack. Where will this battle lead? Find out in the conclusion of the "Jiraiya Ninja Scrolls."

episodes.title: Umareru inochi, shinu inochi
episodes.plot: The shinobi under Madara's Infinite Tsukuyomi continue to slumber and have pleasant dreams. Meanwhile, Naruto and the others have escaped the genjutsu, thanks to Sasuke's protective Susano'o. As Sasuke starts remembering the death of Itachi, his Sharingan starts to resonate and show him the truth that Itachi never spoke a word of.

episodes.title: Isai
episodes.plot: Having experienced the Great Ninja War as a young child, Itachi constantly questions the meaning the life and death, distancing him from other children his age. Soon after entering the Academy, Itachi exhibits his genius and finds himself at the top of his class.

episodes.title: Inochi no itami
episodes.plot: Upon graduating from the Academy, Itachi becomes a genin and joins a team that includes Tenma, Shinko, and their Jonin Leader, Minazuki Sensei. They accept a mission from Granny Cat to look for a missing feline who's a skilled Ninja Cat.

episodes.title: Shisui no irai
episodes.plot: Itachi accompanies his friend Shisui on a three-part training exercise. The two come across a battle between the Hokage's ANBU and the Foundation. Itachi is confused by their motives and can't discern which side is right or wrong. But Shisui is unwavering in his determination to stop the fighting.

episodes.title: Tsukiyo
episodes.plot: Itachi joins the ANBU and is quickly promoted to captain. But he must report directly to Danzo, and is placed as a double agent to observe the Uchiha clan, who are in the midst of planning a coup d'état. With dissatisfaction rising within the clan, the Uchiha ultimately decide to carry out their revolt, and the fateful night approaches.

episodes.title: Akatsuki no yami
episodes.plot: Itachi becomes a rogue ninja and joins the Akatsuki. He is welcomed and introduced by Pain and Orochimaru as the ex-Leaf ANBU and the man who massacred his entire clan. Itachi is paired up with a man named Juzo, and their first job together is to fulfill an assassination request in the Land of Water.

episodes.title: Aibô
episodes.plot: Itachi is partnered with Kisame and begins his missions as a member of the Akatsuki. The duo succeeds in recruiting Deidara, so Pain assigns the newly formed team of Deidara and Sasori to hunt down the deserter Orochimaru. Meanwhile, intel comes in about an immortal killer, so Itachi, Konan and Kakuzu head out to the Land of Steam.

episodes.title: Makoto
episodes.plot: Itachi confronts Sasuke, who for years bore the shame and anger that Itachi brought upon their clan. The truth behind Itachi's story comes to light. Back on the battlefield of the Fourth Great Ninja War, Naruto and the others fight Madara, and just as he is declaring his victory, something unexpected occurs.

episodes.title: Hajimari no mono
episodes.plot: Kaguya Otsutsuki suddenly emerges from Madara's body. She is the mother of Hagoromo, the Sage of the Six Paths who entrusted his powers to Naruto and Sasuke. Kaguya's power is immense and instantly sends Naruto and Sasuke to an alternate dimension. Naruto and Sasuke are the only ones who can seal away Kaguya, but they can't find a jutsu that works against her.

episodes.title: Ôtsutsuki Kaguya
episodes.plot: Kaguya Otsutsuki suddenly descends from the heavens as the people of the Land of Sou look on in surprise and suspicion. But their king, Tenji, is enthralled by her and takes her for his concubine. In this age of endless war, Kaguya wishes for nothing but peace. But as the self-proclaimed protector of the Divine Tree, she soon finds herself engulfed by the tides of chaos and war.

episodes.title: Hagoromo to Hamura
episodes.plot: As Black Zetsu drains Naruto and Sasuke's Chakra into the reborn Kaguya, Black Zetsu tells the story of Kaguya's children: Hagoromo and Hamura in a world ruled by the Infinite Tsukuyomi. Filler episode.

episodes.title: Tsukurareta kako
episodes.plot: Kaguya is furious that Hagoromo has broken the law. Hagoromo finds out what Kaguya did in the past and makes up his mind to fight her. Knowing nothing about her, Hagoromo cannot trust her-he wonders if the love and the despair she experienced are the sole cause of her anger. Unable to reach an understanding, mother and sons begin their long, sad battle.

episodes.title: Iga-sei nanbâwan!
episodes.plot: Naruto adopts a rather hilarious but effective approach to tackle Kaguya. Obito is back in action. Sasuke faces a challenge. The Four Hokages make an unexpected acquaintance

episodes.title: Ninshû
episodes.plot: Rikudô Sen'nin tells the story of how the Ninshû was born.

episodes.title: Ashura to Indora
episodes.plot: Tells the story of the ancestors of the uchiha and senju clan.

episodes.title: Shiren no tabi
episodes.plot: Hagoromo must decide whom will be his successor

episodes.title: Ashura no ketsui
episodes.plot: Indra completes his mission. Asura finds the definitive solution for his village. Hagoromo must take his final decision.

episodes.title: Kôkeisha
episodes.plot: Hagoromo finally chooses who will be the successor to Ninja creed.

episodes.title: Tokubetsu ninmu
episodes.plot: Naruto, Sasuke and Sakura take on a special mission.

episodes.title: Tsunagaru omoi
episodes.plot: The battle with Kaguya continues with an unexpected turn of events.

episodes.title: Futari o chanto
episodes.plot: Obito redeems himself by sacrificing his remaining energy to save Sasuke and Sakura.

episodes.title: Omae wa kanarazu
episodes.plot: Obito, sharing a common bond with Naruto over their ambitions to become Hokage, tells Naruto about his dreams.

episodes.title: Sharingan, futatabi
episodes.plot: Obito enters Kakashi's mind and grants him power.

episodes.title: Omedetô
episodes.plot: The ninjas make their final move to seal Kaguya and free the Tailed Beasts, but Black Zetsu slips through in an attempt to escape defeat.

episodes.title: Shûmatsu no tani
episodes.plot: With Kaguya's defeat, Hagomoro declares that Naruto and Sasuke can combine their power to dispel the Infinite Tsukuyomi, but Sasuke takes control of the Tailed Beasts and reveals his intention to kill the five living kage.

episodes.title: Saigo no tatakai
episodes.plot: Sasuke reveals his motivations as the fated final battle between two friends begins.

episodes.title: Naruto to Sasuke
episodes.plot: A continuation of Naruto and Sasuke final battle.

episodes.title: Wakai no shirushi
episodes.plot: Interrupted in the heat of battle by a blinding light, Naruto and Sasuke begin witnessing flashbacks of their childhood.

episodes.title: Uzumaki Naruto!! "Saishûkai"
episodes.plot: Sakura tends to the wounded Naruto and Sasuke as the tree finally collapses and frees the people of the world; The ninja of Leaf Village begins the long process of recovery after the war; Naruto has a heart-to-heart talk with Iruka.

episodes.title: Naruto to Hinata
episodes.plot: Ostracized due to the Nine Tails that lives within him, young Naruto leads a solitary life in Leaf Village, until a stranger appears; Hinata celebrates her third birthday and meets Neji.

episodes.title: Sasuke to Sakura
episodes.plot: Young Sasuke wants to spend more time with his brother, Itachi; a reclusive Sakura receives a present from Ino.

episodes.title: Gaara to Shikamaru
episodes.plot: A motherless Gaara grows up under the eye of his uncle, Yashamaru; Shikamaru pranks Choji.

episodes.title: Jiraiya to Kakashi
episodes.plot: Young Jiraiya ropes Orochimaru into his plans to get Tsunade to notice him; Rin and Obito try to get to know orphaned loner Kakashi.

episodes.title: Kibaku ningen
episodes.plot: Sasuke begins a journey of atonement following the Fourth Great Ninja War; Kakashi, Naruto and Sakura discuss a series of disappearances in Leaf Village; The village fends off a group of possessed attackers who explode when wounded.

episodes.title: Koroshiamu
episodes.plot: Sasuke, Chino and Nowaki search for clues about the exploding humans who attacked Leaf Village.

episodes.title: Fûshin
episodes.plot: Continuing his investigation, Sasuke follows Orochimaru to the Coliseum to stage a fight and draw out a potential informant, but a sudden attack by more exploding humans derails the plan.

episodes.title: Ketsuryûgan
episodes.plot: After Sasuke fails to capture Fushin, he regroups with Chino at Hell Valley and learns how she came to be associated with Fushin.
